group: Book of Ether/Book of Ether and the Flood/bojandnoah
display_name: The Brother of Jared and Noah
description: Both Noah in the Genesis account and the Brother of Jared were righteous men who were commanded by God to build water-going vessels for themselves and their families (Genesis 6:14i16; Ether 2:16). Also, God is described as making a covenant with both men relating to the future destruction of man (Genesis 9:8i17; Ether 2:8i12). Similar wording in both the Genesis story and the Jaredite account suggest that Moroni’s choice of language was intentionally designed to draw this connection to the attention of the reader.
